amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3583, under the order of 7/23/2014, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 31. Record Vote Number: 245.

action.text: Amendment SA 3583 proposed by Senator Carper.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3583 proposed by Senator Carper.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3583, under the order of 7/23/2014, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 31. Record Vote Number: 245.
